sentence: Among the underlying components of the Russell 3000 index, we saw noteworthy options trading volume today in Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM), where a total of 28,311 contracts have traded so far, representing approximately 2.8 million underlying shares.
That amounts to about 65% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month of 4.4 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $145 strike put option expiring August 17, 2018 , with 1,435 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 143,500 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $145 strike highlighted in orange:

Cooper Tire & Rubber Co. (Symbol: CTB) saw options trading volume of 3,723 contracts, representing approximately 372,300 underlying shares or approximately 62.2% of CTB's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 598,180 shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $22 strike put option expiring August 17, 2018 , with 2,356 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 235,600 underlying shares of CTB.

Below is a chart showing CTB's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $22 strike highlighted in orange:

And Care.com Inc (Symbol: CRCM) options are showing a volume of 890 contracts thus far today.
That number of contracts represents approximately 89,000 underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 62.1% of CRCM's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 143,325 shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $20 strike put option expiring August 17, 2018 , with 462 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 46,200 underlying shares of CRCM.

Below is a chart showing CRCM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $20 strike highlighted in orange:

For the various different available expirations for CRM options , CTB options , or CRCM options , visit StockOptionsChannel.com.
